## Gene Details:
- **MSU gene ID:** [LOC_Os03g07080](http://rice.uga.edu/cgi-bin/ORF_infopage.cgi?orf=LOC_Os03g07080)  
- **RAPdb gene ID:** [Os03g0166800](https://rapdb.dna.affrc.go.jp/locus/?name=Os03g0166800)  
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>OsCCR4b</u>
- **Genome:**  [MSU7](http://rice.uga.edu/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[IRGSP-1.0](https://rapdb.dna.affrc.go.jp/download/irgsp1.html)
- **Species:** *Oryza sativa*

## Functional Descriptions:
   - Both OsCCR4a and **OsCCR4b** fluorescent fusion proteins were localized in the rice cytoplasm and nucleus, and both associated with processing bodies via their N-terminus.

## Function-related keywords:
   - [cytoplasm](/tags/cytoplasm/)

## Literature:
   - [Novel interaction between CCR4 and CAF1 in rice CCR4-NOT deadenylase complex](https://www.doi.org/10.1007/s11103-016-0548-6).&nbsp;&nbsp;DOI:&nbsp;&nbsp;[10.1007/s11103-016-0548-6](https://www.doi.org/10.1007/s11103-016-0548-6);&nbsp;&nbsp;PMID:&nbsp;&nbsp;[27714489](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/27714489/)
